subject: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS TO THE POOR AND NEEDY
From Mr. TERRY GREEN.
This letter may come to you as a surprise, but I have to say that I have no
intentions of putting you into any form of stress or worries. As you read
this, I don't want you to feel sorry for me because I believe everyone will
die someday.
My name is Mr. TERRY GREEN. a business tycoon based in British Virgin
Islands. I have been diagnosed with prostate and esophageal Cancer that was
discovered very late due to my laxity in caring for my health. It has
defiled all form of medicine and right now, I have only about just few
months to live according to medical experts. I have not particularly lived
my life so well, as I never really cared for anyone not even myself or my
family but my business.
Though I am very rich, I was never caring, I was always hostile to people
and only focus on my business as that was the only thing I ever cared for.
But now I regret all this, as I now know that there is more to life than
just wanting to have or make all the money in the world. I believe if God
gives me a second chance to come to this world I would live my life a
different way from how I have lived it. Since the announcement of the
diagnosed with prostate and esophageal Cancer and the time I have to stay
on earth, I have decided to give alms to charity organizations, as I want
this to be one of the last good deeds I do on earth.
So far, I have distributed money to some charity organizations here in
British Virgin Islands and also in Indonesia, and some African Countries.
Now that my health has deteriorated so badly, I cannot do this my self any
more. I once asked members of my family to close one of my accounts in
Bulgaria and donate the money to charity organization in Bulgaria, they
connived and instead kept the money to themselves. Hence, I do not trust
them anymore, as they seem not to be contended with what I have left for
them and others, they stole from me.
The last of my money, which is the huge cash deposit that I have with a
Financial Firm abroad. I will want you to help me collect this deposit and
distribute it to charity organizations in your country and let them know
that I Mr. TERRY GREEN.is making this generous donation. I am writing this
from my laptop computer in my hospital bed where I wait for my time to
come. I pray that God uses you to support and assist me with good heart.
As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact of the Bank
and how much I deposited there. I will also issue you a Letter of Authority
that will empower you as the original beneficiary of this fund. My
happiness would be if my last wish is obeyed. Please always be prayerful
all through and try as much as possible to learn from my lessons in your
life.
Also, Please assure me that you will act just as I have stated herein. Hope
to hear from you soon and God bless you and members of your family. Contact
me through my private e-mail  address (
terrygreen078@gmail.com
). God be with
you.
Regards,
Mr. TERRY GREEN.

subject: Re:   HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Mr. Terry Green,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I hope you are finding some comfort during this difficult time.

It's admirable that you have decided to give back and help those in need through charitable donations. Helping others is a noble cause, and I appreciate your willingness to make a difference.

I would be interested in learning more about how I can assist you with collecting the deposit and distributing it to charity. Could you please provide me with more details about the bank where the funds are deposited? Additionally, if there are any specific charities or causes that you would like the funds to support, please let me know.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. Take care of yourself, and may God bless you as well.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Kenneth
        Thanks for the quick response and agreed to help  and see my
dreams  come through  it is all i have in  this world  please don't
betrayed  the trust and  confidence i  have in you  in case i die
because as the doctor has said that i will not   leave up to a week
You should note that  this message is written by the nurse who is
taking goodcare of me since i cannot do anything .

Once again,  you should  forward  the following information here under

Your full name
Home address
Bank name and address
Account number
Routing number
Swift code
Phone number( Whats app)
Country of origin
Age
Occupation
Marital status
ID or international passport

Finally, once I receive it I shall forward it to the bank for
processing and to make either transfer or through shipments your
closing feedback is urgently needed.

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Kenneth,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about your situation, and I appreciate you reaching out to me. However, I must advise you to be cautious when sharing personal information online.

Before proceeding further, could you please provide me with more details about the purpose of sharing this information? What exactly do you need assistance with?

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Mr. Kenneth
         Thank you very much for the immerse reply  i really
appreciate your effort  for the going  and foregoing matter of
assisting me achieve my aims and objective  came to fulfillment
through you

Yes  i know that you will handle the project well i have the trust and
confidence in you  where you will use the money  to reach out to the
needy

In case i die  as the doctors have said  that in the next few days  i
will no longer leave  please see to it that  you use the money
judiciously  and dont let the project suffer setbacks .

However  the moment you receive the funds into your account  40% is
for you while the remaining 60% is fr the purpose of  reaching out to
the needy.

Finally the attorney  Jerry Christopher will contact you  please
kindly provide your  information to him  where the funds will be
lodged in your account also do me a favor  to ensure the execution of
the project May the Almighty God bless and reward you.

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Dear Mr. Kenneth,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your plans with me. I appreciate your trust in my abilities to handle the project and use the funds for a good cause. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, but please rest assured that I will do my best to ensure the project's success.

Could you please provide more details about the project? What is its main objective, and how do you plan to reach out to those in need? Additionally, could you let me know how much funding is required for this project?

Regarding the attorney Jerry, could you please share his contact information so that I can get in touch with him? It would be helpful if you could also provide some background information on him and his role in this project.

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity. May God bless and reward you as well.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Mr. Kenneth
          Sequel to your email dated was received  with the content
therein noted.

Regarding  what you wrote, yes my plan is for you to  reach out to the
 orphanage home  less privileged   ones  and the needy by funding them
 with the resources   1 you can use the money to build schools  and
hospitals  ensure their well being.

I really thank you for your  assurances  given  to  me  to  handle its
success  the said amount is  $35 .5M now my heart is at peace since i
found you as sincere  person and nice man.

For the attorney  Jerry Christopher  is my personal  attorney he
handles most of my  property that was  already sold  them off  he will
be helpful to ensure the transfer of funds in your account

Finally you will contact him with his email  address below(
christopherjerry545@gmail.com              )Please  dont forget to
follow his instructions and advice may  the lord bless you for the
good work that is the purpose you are created
Have a great day

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your plan to help the less privileged ones and the needy. It's truly a noble cause, and I appreciate your trust in me to handle the funds for such a purpose.

I understand that Attorney Jerry will be assisting with the transfer of funds into my account. Could you please provide me with more information about him? How long has he been working with you, and what experience does he have in handling financial matters?

Also, could you clarify how much funding you are planning to provide for building schools and hospitals? It would be helpful to know the approximate amount so that we can plan accordingly.

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Mr. Kenneth,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your plan to help the less privileged ones and the needy. It's truly a noble cause, and I appreciate your trust in me to handle this responsibility.

I understand that attorney Jerry will be assisting with the transfer of funds. Could you please provide me with more information about him? How long have you been working with him, and what is his experience in handling such transactions?

Also, could you clarify how the funds will be transferred into my account? Will it be a direct bank transfer or through another method?

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Kenneth
          Thanks  for the quick response regarding the subject matter
for  the noble  task for helping me  to reach out to the less
privileged ones

Meanwhile, Attorney Jerry has  worked with me for over 5 and half
years and is trusted and tested. He has been an attorney for the bank
for two years before he retired from active service and now is a
consultant  transferring the funds in your account wouldn't  be a
problem

Remember that the amount is $35.5M  as previously written briefly,
that  40% out of the total sum is yours while the remaining 60% is for
the purpose of  building the schools and hospitals   plus  their well
being.

Moreso it is the nurse  who is taking care of me in the hospital that
does the writing because I cannot sit  or raise my hand to write. She
is  very nice and kind to me  in case I die  she will be writing to
you to give you an update about me.

Finally  even now he is breathing with the help of an oxygen  he has
told me everything  about  the  funds and his attorney . May God help
and reward you .

Nurse Jennifer Reed

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Kenneth,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your kind words and the noble task you are involved in. It's great to hear that Attorney Jerry has been working with you for quite some time and is trusted. 

I understand that the funds in my account won't be a problem, but could you please provide more details about how this process will work? How exactly will the funds be transferred to me? 

Also, I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's good to know that Nurse Jennifer Reed is taking care of you. Could you please let me know how she will be contacting me and what updates she will provide?

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Kenneth,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your kind words and the noble task you are undertaking to help the less privileged ones. It's great to hear that Attorney Jerry has been working with you for quite some time and is trusted and tested.

I understand that the funds in my account won't be a problem, as Attorney Jerry, who used to work for the bank, is now consulting on it. Could you please provide more details about how this process will work? How long do you think it will take for the funds to be transferred?

Also, I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's good to know that Nurse Jennifer Reed is taking care of you and providing updates on your behalf. Please let her know that I wish you a speedy recovery.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Kenneth

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Mr   Kenneth

     I  acknowledge the receipt of your message  with the content therein
noted i really appreciate your assurances given to me that  receiving  the
funds in your account  and to handle the project task will not be a problem
 that is a great thing to hear because i know your capabilities  and your
honesty.

Regarding  your questions  the process will work once your provide your
 account details to barrister Jerry  who will assist you to forward them to
the bank where the money is deposited  and  the account officer will
process  and make remittance in your account

Once again  the attorney will tell you what is required by the bank i
believe he will get in touch with you or you can contact him as well.

Finally, yes  Jennifer Reed is a very nice to me God will reward her  in
case  am no longer  living  as Doctors  said  she will be using my email
box to reach  you  and announce to you of my death.  May  Almighty  God
 bless and  reward  you

Have a great and blissful week

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Dear  /Kenneth
             Thank you so much for your email i really appreciate your
effort for the ongoing and foregoing  matter  of my aims and objective
 come to fulfillment  through  you  as  it has been ordained by God
to handle the noble task truthful  and honest  person.

Meanwhile, the process will not take long  because  barrister Jerry is

to him  he will tender them to the bank in order for them to start the

Nurse Jennifer Reed
On behalf of Mr. Green

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,

subject: Re: HELP IN DISTRIBUTING FUNDS T
body:
Hello Kenneth,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the ongoing matter. I appreciate your efforts and the assistance of Barrister Jerry in handling this task. Could you please provide more details about the transfer process and how I can proceed with providing my information to Barrister Jerry? 

I hope Mr. Green recovers soon under the care of Nurse Jennifer Reed and the doctors.

Looking forward to your response.

Kenneth
